title: comment
description: An comment in SK must always be related to an object.

related_object_type.description: Object type of the comments parent. Is the camelcased base class name: Document for invoice, credit_note,.., Contact for client

related_object_id.description: uuid of the comments parent object.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.
